name: Foldit
summary: Foldit is an online puzzle video game about protein folding. The game is part of an experimental research project, and is developed by the University of Washington's Center for Game Science in collaboration with the UW Department of Biochemistry.
info:
• 平台: Linux
  • 平台: OSX
  • 平台: Windows
  • 官方网站: http://fold.it/portal/
